struct.name: RegistrationRequest
struct.doc: Basic device info published by any unregistered Qeo-enabled device.

member.name: deviceId
member.doc: The device identification generated by Qeo.

member.name: rsaPublicKey
member.doc: The PEM-encoded public key generated by the remote device requesting a registration.

member.name: version
member.doc: Version number indicating the encryption/padding algorithm supported.

member.name: manufacturer
member.doc: The manufacturer of the device (human readable string).

member.name: modelName
member.doc: Model name of the device (human readable string).

member.name: registrationStatus
member.doc: Registration status. Enumeration of the following states: UNREGISTERED, REGISTERING.

member.name: errorCode
member.doc: Error code. Enumeration of the following errors: NONE, CANCELLED, REMOTE_REGISTRATION_TIMEOUT, PLATFORM_FAILURE, INVALID_OTP, INTERNAL_ERROR, NETWORK_FAILURE, SSL_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE, RECEIVED_INVALID_CREDENTIALS, STORE_FAILURE, UNKNOWN.

member.name: errorMessage
member.doc: Error message in case of registration failure.
